item.title: 简历
item.description:
联系方式

Email: feitong.yang@outlook.com

工作经验

公司 地址 工作职位 时间
Citadel New York, NY, U.S.A. 软件工程师 2021/6 至今

Akuna Capital Chicago, IL, U.S.A. 实习量化交易员 2017/6-2017/8
Sparkypants Studios Baltimore, Maryland, U.S.A. 实习C++程序员 2016/5 - 2016/8

教育背景

学位教育
Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, U.S.A.
Ph.D. Cognitive Psychology		 2013/9 – 2018/6
Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, U.S.A.
M.S.E Applied Mathematics and Statistics		 2017/2 - 2018/6
Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, U.S.A.
M.A. Cognitive Psychology		 2013/9 – 2015/6
Peking University, Beijing, China
B.Sc. Experimental Psychology		 2008/9 – 2012/7

研究经验

暑期训练
Brains, Minds & Machines Summer Course
Marine Biological Laboratory, Woods Hole, MA. U.S.A
2017/8 - 2017/9
Computational and Cognitive Neuroscience Summer School
Cold Spring Harbor Asia, Beijing, China
Organizer: Xiao-Jing Wang, Si Wu, Upinder S. Bhalla, Zachary F. Mainen		 2013/7
Computational Neuroscience Summer School
University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA, U.S.A
Advisor: Geoffrey Aguirre
2011/6 - 2011/8
论文发表
Gong, M., Yang, F., & Li, S. (2016). Reward association facilitates distractor suppression in human visual search. European Journal of Neuroscience.
Yang, F., Wu. Q., & Li. S., (2014), Learning-induced uncertainty reduction in perceptual decisions is task-dependent, Frontiers in Human Neuroscience, 8, 282
Li. S., & Yang, F., (2012), Task‐dependent uncertainty modulation of perceptual decisions in the human brain, European Journal of Neuroscience, 36(12), 3732-3739
学术演讲
Yang, F., & Flombaum, J., (2018) Polar coordinates as the format of spatial representation in visual perception, Vision Science Society, 2018, St. Pete, FL.
Yang, F., & Li, S., (2011) Asymmetrical Transfer of Learning Effects between Signal-based and Criterion-based Task Uncertainties in Perceptual Decision, The 7th Asia-Pacific Conference on Vision, Hong Kong.
研究海报
Yang, F., & Flombaum, J. I., (2015) Statistical Learning without Attention, Vision Science Society Meeting 2015, St. Pete, FL.
Yang, F., & Flombaum, J. I., (2014) Ponzo inducers in the working memory produce Illusory line length perception, Vision Science Society Meeting 2014, St. Pete, FL.
Prasad, S., Yang, F., Butt, O., Brandes, L., Datta, R., Thomas, A., & Aguirre, G., (2012) Occipital Areas Distinguish Semantic Content in Congenitally Blind but Not Sighted Individuals. Neurology 2012; 78, P02.018.
Yang, F., & Li, S., (2011) Learning of Uncertain Stimuli Transfers from Criterion-Based to Noise-Based Perceptual Decision, But Not Vice Versa, Vision Science Society Meeting 2011, Naples, FL.
Li, S., & Yang, F., (2010) Learning of Perceptual Judgment under Criterion-based and Noise-based Uncertainties, Society for Neuroscience Annual Meeting 2010, San Diego, CA.
基金与奖项
Robert S. and Dorothy L. Waldrop Graduate Fellowship, Johns Hopkins University
National University Student Innovation Program, Peking University
Student Travel Award, the 7th Asia-Pacific Conference on Vision
Undergraduate Research Grants at Department of Psychology, Peking University
Excellence in Academic Study Award, Peking University
First Prize, National Olympiad in Informatics Contest in China

教授课程

课程 时间
Introduction to Cognitive Psychology, Dr. Jonanthon Flombaum
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course introduced cognitive psychology from the functionalist’s point of view.		 2017 Spring
Unconscious Computations in Mind,
As an Instructor.
In this course, I taught about visual awareness, attention, decision making, and learning.		 2016 Intersession
Research Method, Dr. Howard Egeth
As an Instructor.
This course teaches undergradutes how to conduct scientific research, analyze data, and write an APA-style paper		 2015 Fall
Functional Human Neuroanatomy, Dr. Susan Courtney
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course discussed about neuroanatomy from the perspective of cognitive function.		 2015 Spring
Unconscious Computations in Mind,
As an Instructor.
Every intersession, I offer this introductory course on unconscious computations in mind		 2015 Intersession
Mind, Brain & Experience, Dr. Marina Bedny
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course discussed about brain plasticity, cognitive development, and core knowledge.		 2014 Fall
Neuroscience of Decision Making, Dr. Veit Stuphorn
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course discussed about human learning and decision making process.		 2014 Spring
Computational Vision, Dr. Zili Liu
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course covered basic computational problems and algorithms in vision.		 2012 Fall
Functional Anatomy of Central Nervous System, Dr. Yanjie Su
As a Teaching Assistant.
This course offered a general knowledge of human central nervous system.		 2011 Spring

item.title: 失败简历
item.description: 这个页面收藏了我一路上尝试过并失败过的各种经验。之所以有这个“失败简历”是因为之前普林斯顿的教授Prof. Johannes Haushoferi在网上分享过这样的简历，我觉得很有帮助，而且了解每个人成功的简历背后的各种尝试远比了解这个人有什么成就来得有趣多了。我还会继续保持更新这个页面，这样才能说明我还在继续尝试不同的事情。
